answers.answer: HUH? I did not see anything related to type 2 diabetes in your post, so I am confused as to why you even posted here. You need to see a Gastroenterologist or post on those forums.

question: Sir,Last 4month ago I feel sum disturb form my body giddiness and I feel tired. I got to doctor and I did total body checkup including brain MRA Screening but no problem found on MRA, the problem is only, my total cholesterol was 220 and my SGPT level was 84, after doctor decide to check liver function by ultrasound scanning that result was no problem for my liver. I take medicines for cholesterol around 2month. But still my body feel tired and giddiness. The doctor didn’t give me medicine for reduce SGPT level. It possible to reduce SGPT by medicine? Now what doctor I want to see? What check up I have to do? I am totally confused sir please help me.
title: sgpt
